title: Adjectives (1st/2nd Declension) + Agreement
learning_objectives: Decline adjectives using first declension (feminine) and second declension (masculine/neuter) endings
Apply the agreement rule (adjective matches noun in gender, number, case - NOT ending)
Distinguish between attributive and predicate adjectives
Translate sentences with adjectives modifying nouns
Explain why bonus -a -um has three different forms
module_learning_outcomes: Decline adjectives using first declension (feminine) and second declension (masculine/neuter) endings
Apply the agreement rule (adjective matches noun in gender, number, case - NOT ending)
Distinguish between attributive and predicate adjectives
Translate sentences with adjectives modifying nouns
Explain why bonus -a -um has three different forms based on grammatical gender
